long_description: Combine this lightweight LifeProof armband with the LifeProof case (sold separately) to keep your iPhone(R) 5 secure and close at hand for all the action as you hit the trail, waves or slopes. Supple, breathable spandex and thick padding ensures comfort for the long haul; wide strap and nonslip silicone dots help the armband stay in place. Enjoy complete access to all of your iPhone buttons and controls, camera, speaker and mic. Rip-and-stick strap adjusts to fit biceps measuring 10 - 23 in. LifeProof armband features a one-handed release latch and lock switch.
short_description: Combine this lightweight LifeProof armband with the LifeProof case (sold separately) to keep your iPhone(R) 5 secure and close at hand for all the action as you hit the trail, waves or slopes.
